articles.author: Christine Fernando, USA TODAY
articles.title: Woman charged with hate crimes, accused of pepper-spraying Asian women - USA TODAY
articles.description: Madeline Barker, 47, from Merritt Island, Florida, was arrested and charged in connection to an incident in New York City last week.
articles.content:
A woman was arrested and charged with hate crimes after being accused of making anti-Asian remarks while pepper-spraying four people in New York City last week.

articles.title: Caloy Yulo bags third gold in Asian Championship - Sports Interactive Network Philippines
articles.description: Caloy Yulo claims parallel bars crown, takes third gold in Asian Championship
articles.content:
CALOY Yulo closed his campaign in the 9th Senior Artistic Gymnastics Asian Championships by winning his third gold of the competition by claiming the parallel bars title on Saturday in Doha, Qatar.
